title: Print, "Saucepans for General Mil", 1945
markings: Stamps: Designer's stamp in blueprint at lower right; see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in blueprint with measurements and instructions throughout; at lower left: *note:/all dimensions for handles on pans "A" "B & C" are iden-tical to those on dwgs A-111, A-110 & A-109/top view of handle joinings identical with those/on dwgs A-111, A-110, & A-109; designer's stamp: Eva S. Zeisel Designer/date: September 1945 dwgs A-115 (pan "C") A-116 (pan "B") A-117 (pan "A")/title: Sauce Pans

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Saucepans for General Mil", 1945.
1945. printed with border
Support: paper. Gift of Eva Zeisel. 1993-11-14.
